    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;

    max-width: 560px;
    width: 560px;
    border:none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #707070;
    font-size: 15px;
    font-family: "Raleway";
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 300;
    padding: 13px 140px 13px 0px;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.42)

    color: #FFFFFF;

    width: auto;

    right: 0px;
    top: 3px;

}

    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.42)

    position: relative;
    z-index: 9;
}
selector .aux-filters .aux-selected {
    color: #FFF;
    box-shadow: 0 3px 17px rgba(139, 44, 255, 0.4)
}
selector .aux-filters li > a {
    color: #1E1E1E;
}
selector .aux-filters.aux-cube li > a span::after {
    background: #8B2CFF;
}

selector .aux-filters.aux-cube li > a span {
    padding: 10px 20px;

}

selector .price ins {
    float: right; 
    background: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin-left: 25px;
}

selector .price del,
selector .price del span{
    color: rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.2);
    font-size: 20px;
}
selector .aux-shop-btns-wrapper {
    border: none;
    background-color: #FFF;
    transition: opacity 450ms cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
}
selector .aux-shop-btns-wrapper .button {
    background-color: #8B2CFF;
    color: #FFF;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 15px;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    transform: translatey(20px);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: transform 800ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1) 300ms , opacity 900ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1) 300ms;

}
selector .aux-shop-btns-wrapper .button:hover {
    background-color: transparent;
    color: #8B2CFF;
    border: 1px solid #8B2CFF;
}

selector .aux-shop-btns-wrapper .button i {
    display: none;
}

selector .auxshp-entry-main {
    position: relative;
}
selector .aux-shop-btns-wrapper {
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    top:0;
    left: 0;
    opacity: 0;
}
selector .type-product:hover .aux-shop-meta-wrapper,
selector .type-product:hover .aux-shop-info-wrapper  {
    opacity: 0;
}
selector .type-product:hover .aux-shop-btns-wrapper {
    opacity: 1;
}
selector .type-product:hover .aux-shop-btns-wrapper .button {
    transform: none;
    opacity: 1;
}

selector .auxshp-wishlist-wrapper
{
        transform: translatex(15px);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: transform 800ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1) 300ms , opacity 900ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1) 300ms;
}

selector .type-product:hover .auxshp-wishlist-wrapper {
    transform: none;
    opacity: 1;
}
selector .aux-items-loading  {
    z-index: 0;
}

selector .auxin-onsale-badge {
    width: auto;
    height: auto;
    border-radius: 0;
    
}

selector .aux-widget-recent-products-pro .aux-shop-badges-wrapper {
    right: 15px;

    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    left: 50%;
    
}
selector .aux-shop2-subscribe-wrapper input[type="email"] {
    max-width: 560px;
    width: 560px;
    border:none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #707070;
    font-size: 15px;
    font-family: "Raleway";
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 300;
    padding: 13px 140px 13px 0px;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.42)
}

selector .aux-shop2-subscribe-wrapper input[type="submit"] {
    background: none;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    max-width: none;
    width: auto;
    padding: 13px 0px;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 15px;
    font-family: "Raleway";
    font-weight: 600;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0px;
    top: 3px;  
}
selector .aux-shop2-subscribe-wrapper input[type="email"]::placeholder {
    font-style: normal;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.42)
}
selector .aux-shop2-subscribe-wrapper input[type="email"]:-ms-input-placeholder {
    font-style: normal;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.42)
}
selector .aux-shop2-subscribe-wrapper input[type="email"]::-ms-input-placeholder {
    font-style: normal;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.42)
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 767px){
    selector .aux-shop2-subscribe-wrapper input[type=email] {
        width:100%;
    }
}
